m_szDocTitle: A Cryptocurrency Backed By Solar Energy
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- A Cryptocurrency Backed By Solar Energy Originally published on Ecopreneurist . Cryptocurrency, sometimes referred to as digital currency or alternative currency, has been making waves in the news lately, mostly due to the rapid rise in value of  Bitcoin . But there are other  cryptocurrencies  out there that are less well-known, including one new digital currency that is backed by the generation of solar electricity. It seems appropriate that a new method of earning, spending, and trading value or assets, such as cryptocurrency enables, can be tied to a relati
